definition[0]: a cheque that someone receives as payment for their wages
definition[1]: the amount of wages someone earns
definition[2]: a cheque that pays someone’s wages
example[2]: At the end of the month, stretching your money until the next paycheque arrives often becomes difficult.
definition[3]: the amount of money someone earns
example[3]: The new management has been willing to slash employees’ paychecks to increase profit.
